quotes.text: “The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.”
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: “Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.”
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: “I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.”
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: “You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.”
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: “It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: “That which does not kill us makes us stronger.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: “I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: “The punishment of desire is the agony of unfulfillment”
quotes.author: Hermes Trismegistus

quotes.text: “Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.text: “Besides death, all failure is psychological.”
quotes.author: Jocko Willink

quotes.text: “If you are not willing to be a fool, you can't become a master.”
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.text: “Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.”
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: “Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.”
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: “Learning never exhausts the mind.”
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: “Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: “When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love ...”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: “The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: “If you wish to control others you must first control yourself”
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.text: “You can only fight the way you practice”
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.text: “Today is victory over yourself of yesterday; tomorrow is your victory over lesser men.”
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.text: “The difference between technology and slavery is that slaves are fully aware that they are not free”
quotes.author: Nassim Taleb

quotes.text: “Antifragility is beyond resilience or robustness. The resilient resists shocks and stays the same; the antifragile gets better.”
quotes.author: Nassim Taleb

quotes.text: “Its not the love you make. It's the love you give.”
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: “Most persons are so absorbed in the contemplation of the outside world that they are wholly oblivious to what is passing on within themselves.”
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: “A new idea must not be judged by its immediate results.”
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: “One has to be sane to think clearly, but one can think deeply and be quite insane”
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: “Anti-social behavior is a trait of intelligence in a world full of conformists”
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: “Every living being is an engine geared to the wheelwork of the universe.”
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: “Everything you can imagine is real.”
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: “One of the penalties of refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.”
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: “As long as you live, keep learning how to live.”
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: “Life is like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.”
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: “We’re here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?”
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: “It doesn't make sense to hire smart people and then tell them what to to , We hire smart people so they can tell us what to do.”
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: “Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.”
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: “Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.”
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: “Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win”
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: “The greatest victory is that which requires no battle.”
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: “To know your Enemy, you must become your Enemy.”
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: So games that teach players to build, socialize, and fight will always have the broadest impact.
quotes.author: Tynan Sylvester

quotes.text: “Emotions don’t just appear in response to a change. They also appear in anticipation of change.”
quotes.author: Tynan Sylvester

quotes.text: “The valuable emotions of play can be very subtle. Usually, they’re subtle enough that players don’t consciously detect them.”
quotes.author: Tynan Sylvester

quotes.text: Innovation is saying no to a thousand things.
quotes.author: Gabe Newell

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Gabe Newell

quotes.text: Ninety percent of games lose money; ten percent make a lot of money.
quotes.author: Gabe Newell

quotes.text: Don’t believe that all training systems and theories are of equal validity and then waste precious years of your life frantically trying one after the other.
quotes.author: Mike Mentzer

quotes.text: All exercises should start from a pre-stretched position.
quotes.author: Mike Mentzer

quotes.text: Continuing further will produce a burned out feeling, accompanied by a strong disinclination to continue any type of physical activity.
quotes.author: Mike Mentzer
